subSections.title: Readings
Etymology 1
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|さと}}

# [[village]]
# [[country house]]
# one's [[hometown]]
# the [[country]], the [[countryside]]
# the [[original]] [[home]] of a household member {{qualifier|such as a [[wife]], [[adoptee]], or other person who has joined the household from outside}}
# a separate [[home]] or [[boarding]] [[situation]] to which one's own children are sent for [[upbringing]] or [[education]]
# a [[red-light district]]
# one's [[birth]], [[parentage]], [[origins]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=さと|slang|red-light district}} [[boorishness]], [[hickishness]]
# the [[lay]] world {{qualifier|as opposed to life within a temple}}
# {{lb|ja|sort=さと|obsolete}} in ancient times, a unit of area for regional administration
#: The ''ri'' reading below was more common for this.
# {{lb|ja|sort=さと|obsolete}} in ancient times, a unit of distance
#: The ''ri'' reading below was more common for this.

subSections.title: Synonyms
subSections.text:
* {{sense|village}} {{ja-r|村|むら}}, {{ja-r|村里|むらさと}}
* {{sense|hometown}} {{ja-r|田舎|いなか}}, {{ja-r|故郷|こきょう}}

subSections.title: Derived terms
Proper noun
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|り}}

# A [[unit]] of [[distance]] defined as equal to {{frac|129,600|33}} [[meter]]s: approximately 3.927 [[kilometer]]s or 2.44 [[mile]]s.
